name: HelenMarie Lee
text: Great place to sell gold or silver jewelry that you no longer want ! Saw several pieces of jewelry at some amazing prices if you need to buy check them out! Mother’s Day is coming so make your Mom really happy with jewelry that lasts a lifetime.

name: Noah Wolf
text: nice clean store. Hasn't been open long so he is still building his inventory. Everything is top notch. The only place I sell my gold and silver. I'll recommend it to everyone!

resp.text: Thank you Noah!! Always fun doing business with you!

name: Bobby Millsap
text: absolutely a great place to shop ir browse owner is absolutely the best

name: K3D111 M
text: Wow What a great Pawn Shop! Very Nice and Welcoming, Clean organized, and super customer service! Great inventory selection and fair prices!!! Highly Recommended!

name: Jeff Martin
text:
This store is very clean and nice.
If you are looking for a loan or to buy something for yourself this is the place to go.
If they don't have what you want they will get it for you or point you in the right direction!
Very nice people to deal with!
These guys know customer service!!!

resp.text: Thanks Jeff! Always good to see you!!!

name: Preston Taylor
text: We couldn’t come to an agreement on my jewelry but he’s a nice guy, and would definitely come back to do business with him! Thanks!

name: Madisyn Magistrado
text: The owner is awesome and super friendly! He has a beautiful shop and the jewelry here is gorgeous! Love coming in here!

name: Cortney Patterson
text: Cleanest pawn shop in town! Super nice and honest owner! Definitely recommend.

name: TrashCakes
text: Noice

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review! We look forward to seeing you again😁

name: Jared McGreevy
text: First sandwich was a couple months ago, they make the best I’ve had in Birmingham. Cool little store with nice staff. If you want a bomb sandwich look no further.

resp.text: Thanks for the Support Jared! Hope to see you gain soon. Cheers

name: alesia adams
text: We love Ore!  The deli has the best sandwiches in town and the shops have eclectic and interesting items. It is a great hidden gem in Avondale. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you Alesia!! We greatly appreciate your support and look forward to seeing you again! Cheers

name: Jorge Camacho Yau
text: Place is really nice and the staff members are very welcoming. Love the vibe and the layout of the store!! Everyone is super nice.. I really like the deli. Fresh products and service is top notch. I strongly recommend this place. Got to talk to the owners every time I come by and they are super nice people.. please come by check it out and support local business.

name: sean williamson
text: Great food Sandwich (PCP) & pasta salad, super friendly staff, and clean comfortable vibe. Great addition to the neighborhood!

resp.text: Thanks for the support Sean! We look forward to seeing you in the future! Cheers.

name: Mat Burkett
text: One of the coolest places around! Great selection of products and the food is fantastic!! Great people and service!

resp.text: Thanks for the support Mat! See you next time. Cheers

name: Frog Price
text:
Bread on the 12 inch Crestwood was good. Big sandwich. Quality meat and cheese. Good veggies. Too much bread. Not enough stuff inside. Less meat and cheese than a Subway or any other 12 inch deli sandwich. Not a good value.
Store was nice. I found some good quality patches for my patch jacket. I bought one of each of the four available.

name: Alexander Flachsbart
text: FINALLY birmingham has a good sandwich shop! Ore has some of the absolute best sandwiches I have ever eaten in my life. Get the Crestwood toasted. You’ll thank me later. Oh and go on saturdays for the muffuletta. Best I have had outside New Orleans.

name: Wes Mitchell
text: Excellent service. Food is amazing! Sandwiches are superbly made, fresh, and they taste fantastic. Mozzarella and basil bites are delicious! Not to mention this place has the coolest stuff in town. Everyone should check out Ore.

name: Kimberly Bivins
text:
Great place to buy gifts for family and friends, or if you just want to grab something for yourself.

Also, they’ve opened up a deli with delicious sandwiches and fresh made sides!

name: Duane Boatright
text: Great place with great style. I really enjoyed my sandwich from the deli and the snacks I purchased from the bodega. I recommend swinging by and snack while you shop.

name: BIRMINGHAM BROKER Business
text: We absolutely love this place. I have been able to purchase everything from really cool T-shirts to skateboard supplies for  my kiddo. They have great brands like Filson, Pendleton, Howler, etc.  Great concept.  Not to mention they just opened a deli that we enjoy at least once a week. Bravo. Fully support and recommend.

name: Josef Schuster
text: If you have not been yet do yourself a favor and go check out Ore. It’s a top notch place to grab a fantastic sandwich for lunch I go once a week ( be sure to Try one of the sides they are all great (oh and for sure get a cannoli... you will be happy you did) if the great food isn’t reason enough to stop in, add the unique items for sale in the store end and you will quickly realize that this is a very unique spot that Avondale and Birmingham are lucky to have. Oh I almost forgot to mention any time I have been all the folks who work there are always happy to help and make you feel at home. Bottom line What are you waiting for go get some great grub and find that gift you needed or get something cool for yourself !!! You will be happy you went..

name: PJ Aguirre
text: The sandwiches here are awesome! High quality ingredients & huge! Friendly staff too, in a cool local shop.

name: Greg Grammen
text: Just visited Ore Mercantile for the first time. Had a terrific experience shopping and ended my visit with a fantastic Sammy!! Will be back on the regular.

name: SometimeAfterTwoAM
text: It's about time Birmingham got an authentic italian deli.  I can honestly say I have experienced the real thing in NYC, Long Beach, and LA and this is comparable to all 3 of those.  I had the 6" Avondale and it was more than I could eat.  I don't see how anyone could eat a 12" alone.  I didn't weigh the meat but I'd guess this was 2X the amount of meat & cheese as you'd get on a 12" from Subway or Firehouse Subs and that's on a 6" sandwich.  Bread was gourmet and excellent.  Probably the largest selection of unique sodas and bottled beverages I've ever seen at a restaurant.  I'd estimate there are more than 50 different drinks NOT including traditional Coke and Pepsi products.  Friendly staff made me want to return ASAP.  You cannot go wrong with this true authentic italian deli.

name: Shane B
text: If you want a good sandwich here's the place! Nice service and good portions.

name: gus contreras
text: Such a rad store!!  It’s my one stop shop for birthday and Christmas gifts.  I can’t wait to try out the deli!!

name: mick bruce
text: Great sandwiches loved the Crestwood!

name: Alberto Enes
text: Came for the sandwich, stayed for the cannoli

resp.text: Thanks! Hope to see you again. Cheers

name: Tyler Russell
text: A little something for everyone! So many retailers with something for yourself, friends, and family. Plus, BOILED PEANUTS!!!

name: Jenni Otwell
text: Great spot to shop for yourself or for buying gifts for friends and family!

name: Alex & Katie McKown
text: Love this place!!
